<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Counter Curse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3834) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 169</row>

**Archetype** [Curse Maelstrom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=190)

**Prerequisites**
[Curse Maelstrom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3829)

**Trigger**
You or an ally within 30 feet is targeted by or in the emanation of a [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38) or [misfortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=110) effect from an opponent or object of which you are aware.

**Requirements**
You are in a curse maelstrom state.

</column>

---

You gather the energy of your maelstrom and fling its unleashed power into the enemy's curse, attempting to neutralize it. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the triggering effect, using half your level rounded up as your counteract level and the higher of your class DC and spell DC as the counteract modifier. On a success, you neutralize the curse or misfortune effect. If the effect was constant, such as a misfortune aura, it returns automatically at the beginning of the creature or object's next turn. Whether you succeed or fail, your curse maelstrom state ends.

<title level="2">Counter Curse leads to...</title>
[Reverse Curse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3836)
name: Counter Curse
requirement: You are in a curse maelstrom state.
